claw.tatsu.directive.common

Class Directive

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.directive.common.Directive

  • public final class Directive
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Directive contains only static method to help the generation of the directive related pragma during code transformations.
    Author:
    clementval

    • Method Detail

      • generateLoopSeq

        public static int generateLoopSeq(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                  FfunctionDefinition fctDef,
                                  java.lang.String noDependencyDirective)
        Generate loop seq directives on the top of loops in the given function definition.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        fctDef - Function definition in which do statements will be decorated.
        noDependencyDirective - Directive string used to flag a loop as no dependency loop.
        Returns:
        Number of independent flagged loop.

      • generateUpdate

        public static Xnode generateUpdate(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                   Xnode hook,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> vars,
                                   DataMovement direction)
        Generate update directives for device and host data transfer.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        hook - Node used as a hook for insertion. Update device are generated before the hook and update host after the hook.
        vars - List of variables inserted in the directive.
        direction - Direction of the update directive.
        Returns:
        Last inserted pragma.

      • generateParallelClause

        public static Xnode generateParallelClause(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                           Xnode startStmt,
                                           Xnode endStmt)
        Generate corresponding pragmas to surround the code with a parallel accelerated region.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        startStmt - Start statement representing the beginning of the parallel region.
        endStmt - End statement representing the end of the parallel region.
        Returns:
        Last stmt inserted or null if nothing is inserted.

      • generateParallelLoopClause

        public static void generateParallelLoopClause(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> privates,
                                              Xnode startStmt,
                                              Xnode endStmt,
                                              int collapse)
        Generate directive directive for a parallel loop.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        privates - List of variables to be set privates.
        startStmt - Start statement representing the beginning of the parallel region.
        endStmt - End statement representing the end of the parallel region.
        collapse - If value bigger than 0, a corresponding collapse constructs can be generated.

      • generateLoopDirectives

        public static void generateLoopDirectives(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                          Xnode startStmt,
                                          Xnode endStmt,
                                          int collapse)
        Generates directive directive for a loop region.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        startStmt - Start statement representing the beginning of the loop region.
        endStmt - End statement representing the end of the loop region.
        collapse - If value bigger than 0, a corresponding collapse constructs can be generated.

      • generateDataRegionClause

        public static void generateDataRegionClause(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> presents,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> creates,
                                            Xnode startStmt,
                                            Xnode endStmt)
        Generate directive directive for a data region.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        presents - List of variables to be set as present.
        creates - List of variables to be created.
        startStmt - Start statement representing the beginning of the data region.
        endStmt - End statement representing the end of the data region.

      • getPresentVariables

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPresentVariables(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                                                   FfunctionDefinition fctDef)
        Get all the function variables that are input/output parameters.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Current XcodeML program unit.
        fctDef - Function definition to look in.
        Returns:
        List of variables names that are function input/output.

      • getLocalVariables

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLocalVariables(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                                                 FfunctionDefinition fctDef)
        Get all the local variables in the function definition.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Current XcodeML program unit.
        fctDef - Function definition to look in.
        Returns:
        List of variables names that are function local.

      • getLocalArrays

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLocalArrays(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                                              FfunctionDefinition fctDef)
        Get all the local variables in the function definition.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Current XcodeML program unit.
        fctDef - Function definition to look in.
        Returns:
        List of variables names that are function local.

      • generateAcceleratorClause

        public static Xnode generateAcceleratorClause(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                              Xnode startStmt,
                                              java.lang.String accClause)
        Generate corresponding pragmas applied directly after a CLAW pragma.
        Parameters:
        startStmt - Start statement representing the beginning of the parallel region.
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        accClause - Additional clause append at the end of the directive.
        Returns:
        Last stmt inserted or null if nothing is inserted.

      • generateRoutineDirectives

        public static void generateRoutineDirectives(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                             FfunctionDefinition fctDef)
        Generate all corresponding pragmas to be applied to an accelerated function/subroutine.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        fctDef - Function/subroutine in which directive directives are generated.

      • generatePrivateClause

        public static void generatePrivateClause(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                         Xnode stmt,
                                         java.lang.String var)
        Generate the correct clauses for private variable on directive.
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - Object representation of the current XcodeML representation in which the pragmas will be generated.
        stmt - Statement from which we looks for a parallel clause to append private clauses.
        var - Variable to generate the private clause.

      • findParallelRegionStart

        public static Xnode findParallelRegionStart(Xnode functionDefinition,
                                            Xnode from)
        Skip elements in preamble and find the first element that will be included in the parallel region.
        Parameters:
        functionDefinition - Function definition in which body checked.
        from - Optional element to start from. If null, starts from first element in function's body.
        Returns:
        First element for the parallel region.

      • findParallelRegionEnd

        public static Xnode findParallelRegionEnd(Xnode functionDefinition,
                                          Xnode from)
        Skip elements in epilogue and find the last element that will be included in the parallel region.
        Parameters:
        functionDefinition - Function definition in which body checked.
        from - Optional element to start from. If null, starts from last element in function's body.
        Returns:
        Last element for the parallel region.
